mods.abstract: Male child, Scotch boy doll, composition head on hard board body, composition arms and legs, molded and painted features, jointed at shoulders and hips, glass eyes, open mouth with four teeth, painted boots, black fur hat, plaid kilt above knee length skirt with fur decoration on front, orange felt jacket with golden pin on front neck and golden buttons on cuffs, brown belt, diagonal shoulder straps of white and plaid, doll body and costume, machine-made. Accompanying information describes that the dress of men and boy of Scotland.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
